name: Blood Splash
description:
Try to escape from the lab while being blind!

Play as a blind creature trying to escape from the lab which you were created in by using your own blood, the only thing you are able to see.

Each time you are going to die on a trap, your blood will reveal the environment and allow you to come back with more visibility. You can also splash your own blood but use it carefully and wisely to avoid unnecessary travels.

This is a one-key-feature game we create as end of year’s project. We are 5 French guys enjoying video game creation. We had to choose between many topics, ours were « Death is good » and « Limited Visibility ». We obviously tried to combine those two topics in a way we hope you will enjoy.

Please leave us your comment and tell us what you think of our modest first game published online.

Default controls:

This is a keyboard only video game.

ZQSD to move the creature.

SPACEBAR to jump.

R to splash your blood around the creature.
